room.name: Honksley Hall
room.desc: The hub of all student activity. Students are bustling to get to their next Glass (Goofy Class).

item.name: Red Nose
item.desc: Someone dropped their nose. Oh well, finders keepers, amirite?

room.name: Computer Lab
room.desc: Millions of computers are lined up. Millions. Clown college has gotten more and more popular

item.name: Floppy disk
item.desc: Who put this here? Was this someone's idea of a joke? This may be clown college, but that is NOT funny.

item.name: A copy of E.T. for the Atari 2600
item.desc: Based on the film of the same name. Released in 1982 never to be seen again.

room.name: Darkened Hallway
room.desc: A faint droning can be heard. It sounded like it was miles away, but as soon as you stepped foot in the hallway, you realize it's right by your ear.

item.name: Whoopie cushion
item.desc: Someone wrote 'TURN ME OVER' in blood on it. You turn it over. The other side says 'GOTCHA', also written in blood. Classy.

room.name: Bathroom
room.desc: The stalls are arranged in a circle. In the center, there are ten sinks, each a different color of the rainbow. Carousel music is playing. After a few seconds, you realize the whole room is spinning.

room.name: Biology Lab
room.desc: The stench of Clown Biology fills the air. These Clown Biology majors are clownier than you'll ever be. You wonder if you really belong here.

item.name: Clown skeleton
item.desc: You didn't realize clown skeletons looked different than human ones. Apparently they do.

item.name: Educational poster
item.desc: It says 'CLOWN REPRODUCTION' in huge letters. The diagram depicts a pie being hurled at a clown, along with an equation tracking the trajcetory of the pie. Who knew biology had so much calculus?

room.name: Jester's Courtyard
room.desc: It's cold outside. It makes your clown makeup itch a lot. This must be the main outside area - clowns are walking and running and hand-walking and hand-running and headstanding and juggling and brandishing pies everywhere. You realize this might be the right place for you after all.

item.name: Banjo
item.desc: Someone left their banjo. It looks expensive.

room.name: Clown Containment Units, 1st Floor
room.desc: You enter the first floor of the student housing. Each dorm room door is a different color of the rainbow.

item.name: Cookie
item.desc: Oatmeal raisin. Hmm... That's the least silly cookie out there! This has no business being at clown college. You might turn this into security - the perp could be suspended for anti-silly sentiment.

room.name: Clown Containment Units, 2nd Floor
room.desc: You take the elevator up. These doors aren't colored as brightly... Something feels off.

room.name: Clown Containment Units, 3rd Floor
room.desc: You take the elevator up. These doors... They're metal, and spaced only one foot apart. This isn't right... This isn't right at all... There's a goth clown sitting in the corner of the room reading.

item.name: Piece of broken glass
item.desc: There's some custard on it... Something horrible has happened here.

room.name: Your dorm
room.desc: It's approximately 5 feet in width, and goes 10 feet deep. Not huge, but at least you're in a single!
